info.description: One Manage APIs for all-clusters-view and multi-cluster Fabric handling APIs
info.title: Nexus Dashboard OneManage v1

get.description: Returns the summary of advisories across clusters.
get.summary: Get advisory level summary across clusters

get.description: Return the number of anomalies for each trend interval in the given time range

parameters.description: Time interval as date string (600m / 12h / 2d) for trend in anomalies (default is 1d)
parameters.name: interval

parameters.description: Offset from UTC based on the user's time zone
parameters.name: timezoneOffset

get.summary: Get trend of the alerts (advisory or anomaly) across clusters

get.description: Returns the summary of anomalies across all clusters.
get.summary: Get the summary of anomalies across all clusters

get.description: Get the count of all connected fabrics in Nexus Dashboard or for a given fabric.
get.summary: Get the count of all connected fabrics in Nexus Dashboard or for a given fabric

get.description: Get all connected fabrics in Nexus Dashboard or for a given fabric.
get.summary: Get all connected fabrics in Nexus Dashboard or for a given fabric.

get.description: Based on the entity name given, fetch the matched results across clusters and group them into categories
get.summary: search for entity name across all clusters

get.description: Based on the partial entity name given, fetch possible suggestions across clusters to guide search query to a terminal query

delete.description: Delete data from an APIC cluster using the given path

get.description: Get data from an APIC cluster using the given path

category.description: search category to filter search results with
category.name: category

queryCategory.description: Filter by category of fabric for fabricGroups

searchQuery.description: Find network entities across network using a complete or incomplete network entity name

filter.description: Lucene format filter - Filter the response based on this filter field
filter.name: filter

fabricStatus.description: Filter by fabric status (online, offline, all)
fabricStatus.name: fabricStatus

alertTypeParam.description: Categorization of alert record (Anomaly or Advisory)
alertTypeParam.name: alertType

includeAnomalies.name: includeAnomalies
includeAnomalies.description: Filter by root cause categories (isRoot, isCorrelated anomaly fields)

offset.description: Number of records to skip for pagination
offset.name: offset

sort.description: Sort the records by the declared fields in either ascending (default) or descending (:desc) order

one_field_default_order.summary: Sort by field1 in descending order

one_field_custom_order.summary: Sort by field1 in ascending order

multiple_fields.summary: Sort by field1 in ascending order and field2 in descending order

sort.name: sort

getContentTypeHeader.description: Content type header to indicate if response should be in CSV or JSON format
getContentTypeHeader.name: X-Content-Type

example.description: The server could not understand the request due to incorrect syntax.
Indicates that the request requires user authentication information.
The client does not have access rights to the content.
The server cannot find the requested resource.
The user has sent too many requests in a given amount of time.
The server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request.

ApicUrl.description: Unique URL of the APIC endpoint

allOf.description: Extend advisorySummary with all cluster info

advisories.description: Extend Advisory object with clusterName and fabricCount

allOf.description: Extend anomalySummary with all cluster info

anomalies.description: Extend Anomaly object with clusterName and fabricCount

auditRecord.description: An audit record for a resource

action.description: Action performed on the resource. E.g, upload/create/update/delete.

affectedResource.description: Resource on which this action was initiated.

clientIp.description: IP address of the machine from which this action was initiated.

creationTime.description: Date and time at which this record was created

description.description: A summary of the audit record details.

fabricName.description: Name of the fabric on which this action was initiated.

id.description: The unique id of the audit record

resourceOverviewUrl.description: Link to the UI View URL of the resource, without the hostname.

resourceType.description: Type of resource that's being audited. For a security audit this will be "security"

traceId.description: Trace ID, to track within the debug logs.

username.description: Nexus Dashboard user that performed this action.

categoryResult.description: A search result for a particular category
categoryResult.title: Category Result

clusterType.description: Type of the cluster. ND - NexusDashboard, APIC - Application policy infrastructure controller

numberOfFabrics.description: Count of Fabrics on the cluster

numberOfNodes.description: Count of Nexus dashboard nodes on the cluster

counterNameValues.description: List of counter name and their values

counters.description: List of counter name and counter value

searchQuery.description: Query specified by the user to search for an entity across fabrics

oneManageSearchResponse.description: Provide a list of suggestions from across clusters to help the user to complete the query sentence

result.description: Endpoint in fabric ABC on vrf vrf2, vlan vlan1
result.name: 00:00:11:11:AB:03

searchQuery.description: Query specified by the user to search for an entity across the network

suggestions.description: List of suggested queries based on the user's search query as input

oneManageSearchResponse.title: Search Response

oneManageSearchResultResponse.description: Provide search results across clusters based on the query the user specified, grouped into categories

categoryResults.name: 00:00:11:11:AB:03

results.description: List of results based on the query the user specified, grouped into categories

searchQuery.description: Query specified by the user to search for an entity across the network

oneManageSearchResultResponse.title: Search Result Response

searchResult.description: Result based on the query the user specified

categoryResults.description: List of search results for a particular category

searchResult.title: Search Result

suggestionInfo.description: Single suggested query based on the user's search query as input

target.description: Information to view more details about the suggestion

fabricManagementIp.description: Switch IPv4/v6 address used for management

fabricType.description: Fabric type. Its allowed values will be specified later

switchId.description: Serial number of Switch or Node Id of ACI switch

consistentStatus.description: Flag to indicate the vPC status is consistent

intendedPeerName.description: Intended vPC host name for pre-provisioned peer switch

alertScore.description: Equal to the highest alert score found in this query

advisorySummary.description: An advisory summary represents a group of advisories aggregated by the groupBy parameter

category.description: The category of the advisories summary

advisoryCount.description: Total number of advisories in this advisories Summary

advisoriesSummary.description: Summary of advisories aggregated by the groupBy parameter

advisories.description: List of advisory summaries. An advisory summary represents a group of advisories aggregated by the groupBy parameter

allClusterProp.description: Properties required for all cluster apis

message.description: The message that can be displayed to the user

description.description: A detailed description or suggestions on how to correct the error

example.description: The email you provided is invalid

message.description: The message that can be displayed to the user

description.description: A detailed description or suggestions on how to correct the error

example.description: You are not authorized to access this resource

alertsTrend.description: A summary and details of alert trends

alerts.description: List of alert trends containing alert trend summaries and details in the time period

items.description: Trend of alerts based on alert type (anomaly/advisory)

alertCount.description: Total number of alert entries in this alertType grouping

minorAlertCount.description: Current total alert for the minor category of alerts

majorAlertCount.description: Current total alert for the major category of alerts

criticalAlertCount.description: Current total alert for the critical category of alerts

warningAlertCount.description: Current total alert for the warning category of alerts

majorAlertTrend.description: Current alert trend for the major category of anomalies

minorAlertTrend.description: Current alert trend for the minor category of anomalies

warningAlertTrend.description: Current alert trend for the warning category of advisories

alertTrend.description: Current alert trend for all advisories in the total time period

alertTrendEntries.description: List of alert trend counts at this timestamp for each severity level

items.description: Alert trend entry containing the count of alerts for each severity at the related timestamp

timestamp.description: timestamp of when the alert trend time period was taken

minor.description: number of minor alerts in this entry

major.description: number of major alerts in this entry

warning.description: number of warning alerts in this entry

critical.description: number of critical alerts in this entry

ruleType.description: Type of the rule that generated the anomaly

anomalySummary.description: An anomaly summary represents a group of anomalies aggregated by the groupBy parameter

category.description: The category of the anomalies summary

anomalyCount.description: Total number of anomalies in this anomalies summary

anomaliesSummary.description: Summary of anomalies aggregated by the groupBy parameter

anomalies.description: List of anomaly summaries. An anomaly summary represents a group of anomaly aggregated by the groupBy parameter

tunnelDirection.description: Direction of the tunnel for source switch.

isSrcInterFabricCapable.description: Flag to indicate if Source fabric has either of features enabled to support interfabric.

srcFabricClusterName.description: ND Cluster name of source fabric.

isDstInterFabricCapable.description: Flag to indicate if Destination fabric has either of features enabled to support interfabric.

dstFabricClusterName.description: ND Cluster name of destination fabric.

MetadataLinks.description: The links to the next and previous pages

next.description: The link to the next page

previous.description: The link to the previous page

description.description: Detailed Information about  the search result

endpointMetadata.description: Fields related to endpoint search result

tenant.description: Tenant where the endpoint is configured

interfaceName.description: Name of the interface associated with the endpoint

isTerminalQuery.description: Flag that is set to true if suggestion is a complete query

filters.description: Filter supporting key, value pair and lucene filter

additionalProperties.description: additional filter to be applied to the query

baseProperties.description: Properties shared by all fabric and fabric group types

locationDetails.description: An object describing a specific location with Latitude and Longitude in decimal degrees.

licenseTier.description: License Tier value of a fabric.

alertSuspend.description: Alert Suspend state configured on the fabric

securityDomain.description: Security Domain associated with the fabric

fabricProperties.description: Properties shared by all fabric types

telemetrySourceInterface.description: Telemetry Source Interface (VLAN id or Loopback id) only valid if Telemetry Collection is set to inBand

telemetrySourceVrf.description: VRF over which telemetry is streamed, valid only if telemetry collection is set to inband

featureUsage.description: Mapping of feature usage by cluster for this fabric

featureStatus.description: Mapping of features to their statuses

local.description: This fabric is managed locally or was onboarded locally

allowedActions.description: Actions allowed on the listed fabrics

softwareVersions.description: Software versions of switches in the fabric

fabricGroupName.description: Group (if any) this fabric belongs to

summaryBgpAsn.description: Summary property for the fabric types that need BGP ASN

configSyncStatus.description: Details of configuration sync status for this fabric

aimlIbgpSummary.description: AI iBGP VXLAN fabric summary component

aimlEbgpSummary.description: AI eBGP VXLAN fabric summary component

summaryFirstHopRedundancyProtocol.description: Summary property for the fabric types that need FHRP

controller.description: Configuration and status of a controller in the fabric

configSyncStatus.description: Details of configuration sync status for this fabric

templateCount.description: Number of templates for this fabric

controllers.description: List of controllers in the cluster

trapForwarder.description: Enables syslog and trap monitoring for the ACI fabric

summaryFabricProperties.description: Fabric type related parameters for summary

management.description: Fabric summary based on the fabric type

supported.description: Indicates if traffic analytics troubleshoot jobs are supported on this fabric

minSwitchVersion.description: Minimum switch version required for running a traffic analytics troubleshoot job

summaryTrafficProperties.description: An object describing the traffic analytics related properties for the fabric

telemetryClusterFlowCollectionMode.description: Reflects the flow collection mode of the fabric's telemetry cluster

consolidatedTelemetryStatus.description: Consolidated telemetry status of all enabled features. This will be set to na when telemetry is disabled.

telemetryStatus.description: Telemetry status overview of the fabric.

telemetryStatusDescription.example: Some switches are streaming telemetry data

enabled.description: Indicates whether telemetry is paused or resumed.

integrationName.description: Integration name of a hypershield integration

integrations.description: Hypershield integration objects this fabric is associated with

tenants.description: Hypershield tenants this fabric is associated with

category.description: Category of the object, always fabric for fabric summary

clusterName.description: Name of cluster where resource is present

clusterFabricSummary.description: fabric object for all cluster view.

fabricGroupSummaryManagement.description: Management properties for the fabric group summary

fabricGroupSummaryProperties.description: Summary properties for the fabric group

multiClusterFabricGroupName.description: Shows the name of the Multi-Cluster Fabric Group if the fabric is a shadow of a Multi-Cluster Fabric Group

management.description: Fabric summary based on the fabric type

category.description: Category of the fabricGroup, which is always fabricGroup

clusterFabricGroupSummary.description: fabric object for all cluster view.

consistencyStatusEnum.description: Consistency status of the multi-cluster fabric group and its members

consistencyStatusObject.description: Consistency status of the multi-cluster fabric group and its members

fabricSummaryBrief.description: Light weight summary of a fabric

fabricsSummaryBrief.description: Light weight summary of all fabrics

switchRole.description: The role of the switch, meta is a read-only switch role

vdc.description: Whether the switch is the type of VDC.

portChannel.description: Whether its a port channel link

srcInterfaceConfig.description: Source interface freeform configuration.All configs should strictly match 'show run' output, with respect to case and newlines. Any mismatches will yield unexpected diffs during deploy.

dstInterfaceConfig.description: Destination interface freeform configuration.All configs should strictly match 'show run' output, with respect to case and newlines. Any mismatches will yield unexpected diffs during deploy.

srcIp.description: IP address of the source interface.

dstIp.description: IP address of the destination interface.

srcIpv6.description: Ipv6 address of the source interface.

dstIpv6.description: Ipv6 address of the destination interface.

bfdEchoOnSrcInterface.description: Disable BFD Echo on source interface.Applicable only when BFD is enabled in the fabric.

bfdEchoOnDstInterface.description: Disable BFD echo on destination interface.Applicable only when BFD is enabled in the fabric.

dhcpRelayOnSrcInterface.description: Enable DHCP relay on source interface.

dhcpRelayOnDstInterface.description: Enable DHCP relay on destination interface.

intIntraFabricUnnumLinkConfig.description: Int intra fabric unnum link config

dhcpRelayOnSrcInterface.description: Enable DHCP relay on source interface.

dhcpRelayOnDstInterface.description: Enable DHCP relay on destination interface.

intIntraVpcPeerKeepAliveLinkConfig.description: Int intra vpc peer keep alive link config

intIntraVpcPeerKeepAliveLink.description: Int intra vpc peer keep alive link

intPreProvisionIntraFabricLinkConfig.description: Int pre provision intra fabric link config

intPreProvisionIntraFabricLink.description: Int pre provision intra fabric link

iosXeIntIntraFabricNumLinkConfig.description: Ios xe int intra fabric num link config

iosXeIntIntraFabricNumLink.description: Ios xe int intra fabric num link

srcIpAddressMask.description: Ipv4 address with mask of Source Interface.

srcIPv6AddressMask.description: Ipv6 address with mask of source interface.

srcMACsecPolicyKeyChainNamePrefix.description: Source MACsec policy/key-chain name prefix. Prefix to be used to form policy and key-chain names for MACsec configuration at source.

dstMACsecPolicyKeyChainNamePrefix.description: Destination MACsec policy/key-chain Name prefix. Prefix to be used to form policy and key-chain names for MACsec configuration at destination.

useLinkMACsecSetting.description: Use link MACsec setting. Option to use link MACsec settings instead of fabric settings for this interface.

macsecPrimaryKeyString.description: MACsec primary key string. Cisco Type 7 Encrypted Octet String

macsecPrimaryCryptographicAlgorithm.description: MACsec primary cryptographic algorithm. AES_128_CMAC or AES_256_CMAC.

macsecFallbackKeyString.description: MACsec fallback key string. Cisco Type 7 Encrypted Octet String.

macsecFallbackCryptographicAlgorithm.description: MACsec fallback cryptographic algorithm. AES_128_CMAC or AES_256_CMAC.

srcKmeServerIp.description: Source KME server ip. Key Management Entity server Ipv4 address.

srcKmeServerPortNumber.description: Source KME server port number. Key Management Entity server port number.

srcTrustpointLabel.description: Source trust point label. Tls authentication type trustpoint label.

dstKmeServerIp.description: Destination KME server IP. Key Management Entity server Ipv4 address.

dstKmeServerPortNumber.description: Destination KME server port number. Key Management Entity server port number.

dstTrustpointLabel.description: Destination trust point label. Tls authentication type trustpoint label.

ignoreCertificate.description: Ignore certificate to skip verification of incoming certificate.

autoGenConfigDefaultVrf.description: Auto generate configuration on default VRF.If enabled, auto generate default VRF configuration over the physical or port-channel interface for border device in easy fabric.

autoGenConfigNxPeerDefaultVrf.description: Auto generate configuration for NX-OS/IOS XE Peer on default VRF. If enabled, auto generate Default VRF (Global VRF for IOS XE) configuration for managed neighbor devices.

redistribBgpRouteMapName.description: Redistribute BGP route map name. Route-map used to redistribute BGP routes to IGP in default VRF. Applicable only for easy fabric.

defaultVrfBgpPasswordKeyEncryptionType.description: Default VRF bgp neighbor password enryption type.

vrfNameNxPeerSwitch.description: VRF name in NX-OS peer switch. This field is applied to the edge router when the link is between a border in easy fabric and an edge router in external fabric. Default VRF is used when blank. Border device always uses default VRF.

dciTracking.description: Enable dci-tracking on the physical interface in the easy fabric side of this link, if the switch is any type of border gateway.

routingTag.description: Routing tag associated with interface IP for default VRF.

vrfLiteExtFabricSetupConfig.description: Vrf lite ext fabric setup config

autoGenConfigPeer.description: Auto generate configuration for peer.If enabled, auto generate VRF Lite configuration for managed NX-OS neighbor devices.

templateConfigGenPeer.description: Template for configuration generation on peer.Python template for VRF Lite configuration on NX-OS peer in external fabric.

srcBgpAsn.description: BGP autonomous system number in source fabric.

dstBgpAsn.description: BGP autonomous system number in destination fabric.

vrfLiteExtFabricSetupOspfConfig.description: Vrf lite ext fabric setup ospf config

autoGenConfigPeer.description: Auto generate configuration for peer.If enabled, auto generate VRF Lite configuration for managed NX-OS neighbor devices.

templateConfigGenPeer.description: Template for configuration generation on peer.Python template for VRF Lite configuration on NX-OS peer in external fabric.

vrfLiteExtFabricSetupOspf.description: Vrf lite ext fabric setup ospf

bgpNeighborPassword.description: BGP neighbor password. Type 7 encoded key.

srcBgpAsn.description: BGP autonomous system number in source fabric.

dstBgpAsn.description: BGP autonomous system number in destination fabric.

dciTrackingEnableFlag.description: DCI tracking enable flag to deploy DCI tracking.

inheritBgpPasswordMsdSettings.description: Inherit eBGP password from MSD settings. Applicable only when source and destination fabric are in the same MSD fabric.

srcIp.description: ipv4 address of the source interface.

dstIp.description: ipv4 address of the destination interface.

srcInterfaceAdminState.description: Admin state of the source interface.

dstInterfaceAdminState.description: Admin state of the destination interface.

csrExtEvpnMultisiteOverlaySetupConfig.description: Csr ext evpn multisite overlay setup config

bgpNeighborPassword.description: BGP neighbor password. Type 7 encoded key.

ebgpMultihop.description: eBGP time-To-live value for remote peer.

srcIPAddress.description: IP address for sub-interface in each VRF in source fabric.
